research_municipality_step.notes: The Mayor of Colorado City, Ruben Hurt, was a candidate in the May 3, 2025, general election for Mayor and received the highest number of votes. The City Council consists of six members elected from single-member districts, and the Mayor is elected at large. As of the latest available information, the position for City Councilmember, District 4, is vacant. Information on council members is primarily sourced from the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory.
